about_the_game:
It seems you've been led astray, haven't you?


April 26, 2003

You arrive in Aerie Vista to finally meet your online friends in person. What starts as a simple trip soon takes a dark turn. When a trip to the bookstore leads you all into a gateway to the other world, you find yourselves in an alternate realm filled with mystery and danger.



As a Soultracer, you're able to separate your soul from your body, allowing you to navigate this strange new world where you’ll encounter cryptic puzzles, eerie environments, and indescribable horrors. You will meet new faces along the way, and it will be up to you to decide whom you can trust. With its nostalgic PS1 and PS2-inspired graphics, Soultracer offers a thrilling experience reminiscent of classic survival horror games.

Got souls to spend?


Be sure to speak with the bartender! She'll have what you need for a fair price. She will always give you some advice in case the road ahead is not clear enough. Don't forget to regularly check what she has new in stock, you'll need all the help you can get.

Key Features:

- Return To Survival Horror: Experience a game designed with the visual and atmospheric style of PS1 and PS2-era survival horror titles. Heavily inspired by Resident Evil, Silent Hill, Haunting Ground and Alone in the Dark.

- Mysterious World: Explore a parallel world with intriguing environments and cryptic challenges that blur the line between reality and nightmare.

- Engaging Story: Follow a gripping narrative as you and your friends uncover the dark secrets of this new world. Each of you plays a crucial role in piecing together the mystery that binds this world to the unknown. 7 - 8 hours of story content.

- Dynamic NPC Interactions: Meet a range of NPCs who may offer guidance, assistance, or present new challenges as you progress.

- Challenging Enemies: Enemies pose an immediate threat, don't let your guard down. Featuring boss fights that require both brains & brawn, thread very carefully.



- Weapons & Items: Manage your resources via your inventory. There's a wide variety of different weapons, each one more efficient for certain tasks at hand.

- Puzzles: Always think outside the box if you wish to survive the night. Your skills will be tested.



- Replayability: Everything is not always going to be the same! Curious on what would happen if you did things differently? Then you can always choose differently next time!

- Voice Acting: Each character you meet is brought to life thanks to talented voice actors.

- Original Soundtrack: Original musical scores composed for Soultracer. Inspired by other titans of the genre. (Silent Hill, Haunting Ground)

- Secrets & Extras: Rewards for completing certain milestones within the other world. These may range from weapons to clothing. Can you find them all?



Can you help your friends survive the darkness that lies beyond and escape this world? Your quest in Soultracer will test your courage, wit, and resilience.

You're the only one who can.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, General Mature Content

  • Graphics: GPUs supporting DirectX9 or above
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on low performance systems.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 7th Gen Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1030 or AMD equivalent

short_description: You and your friends stumble upon a gateway to another reality, one that harbors horrors beyond human comprehension. Fight through all evil and survive at all costs. There's something special about you, Soultracer, and only you can save your friends from the terror within.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
